riddles: What has to be broken before you can use it?
jokes:
Why dont skeletons fight each other?
Because They dont have the guts

riddles: Im tall when Im young, and Im short when Im old. What am I?
jokes:
What do you call fake spaghetti?
An impasta!

riddles: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
jokes:
Why was the math book sad?
Because it had too many problems.

riddles: What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
jokes:
What do you call cheese that isn't yours?
Nacho cheese!

riddles: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
jokes:
What do you call an alligator in a vest?
An investigator!

riddles: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
jokes:
Why did the bicycle fall over?
Because it was two-tired!

riddles: What has keys but cant open locks?
jokes:
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
In case he got a hole in one.
